014package org.jdbi.v3.core.statement;
015
016import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
017import java.sql.SQLException;
018
019/**
020 * Some simple {@link StatementCustomizer}s you might find handy.
021 */
022public final class StatementCustomizers {
023    private StatementCustomizers() {}
024
025    /**
026     * Set a timeout on the statement.
027     * @param seconds timeout in seconds
028     * @return the customizer
029     */
030    public static StatementCustomizer statementTimeout(final int seconds) {
031        return new StatementCustomizer() {
032            @Override
033            public void beforeExecution(final PreparedStatement stmt, final StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
034                stmt.setQueryTimeout(seconds);
035            }
036        };
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Set the number of rows to fetch from the database in a single batch.
041     * In a transaction, may enable streaming result sets instead of buffering in memory.
042     * @param fetchSize number of rows to fetch at a time
043     * @return the customizer
044     */
045    public static StatementCustomizer fetchSize(final int fetchSize) {
046        return new StatementCustomizer() {
047            @Override
048            public void beforeExecution(final PreparedStatement stmt, final StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
049                stmt.setFetchSize(fetchSize);
050            }
051        };
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * Limit number of rows returned.  Note that this may be significantly
056     * less efficient than doing it in the SQL with a {@code LIMIT} clause
057     * and is not recommended unless you understand why you need it specifically.
058     * @param maxRows number of rows to return
059     * @return the customizer
060     */
061    public static StatementCustomizer maxRows(final int maxRows) {
062        return new StatementCustomizer() {
063            @Override
064            public void beforeExecution(final PreparedStatement stmt, final StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
065                stmt.setMaxRows(maxRows);
066            }
067        };
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Sets the limit of large variable size types like {@code VARCHAR}.
072     * Limited data is silently discarded, so be careful!
073     * @param maxFieldSize the maximum field size to return
074     * @return the customizer
075     */
076    public static StatementCustomizer maxFieldSize(final int maxFieldSize) {
077        return new StatementCustomizer() {
078            @Override
079            public void beforeExecution(final PreparedStatement stmt, final StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
080                stmt.setMaxFieldSize(maxFieldSize);
081            }
082        };
083    }
084}
